email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and LOA of 280m. The laycan is 15-20 October. Our starting freight quote is in the low 50s ($50.50 per ton). Let me know if this works for you or if you’d like to discuss further. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit higher than expected. Would you consider coming down to the mid-40s? Also, could you confirm the vessel’s availability for the laycan? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your concerns about the rate. After discussing with the owner, we can offer $48.75 per ton, which is a significant adjustment. The MV Ocean Star is confirmed available for the laycan. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $48.75 sounds more reasonable. However, we’d like to lock in at $47.50 if possible. Also, could you clarify the demurrage terms? We’d prefer a rate of $15,000 per day pro rata. Let me know your thoughts. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I appreciate your counteroffer. After further negotiation, the owner has agreed to $47.75 per ton, which is the best we can do. Regarding demurrage, we can agree to $15,000 per day pro rata. If this works for you, I’ll draft the charter party agreement. Let me know. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $47.75 and the demurrage terms are acceptable. Please proceed with drafting the charter party agreement. Let’s aim to finalize by end of day. Thanks for your efforts on this. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great news! I’ll have the charter party agreement sent over shortly. To recap: MV Ocean Star, 150,000 DWT, laycan 15-20 October, freight rate $47.75 per ton, and demurrage at $15,000 per day pro rata. Let me know if you need anything else. Best, Sarah
